prompt:
As an AI, your goal is to extract key pieces of information from the given email data. Your task is to identify and fetch the sender, recipient, subject matter, and the main body of the email and present this information as a JSON object. 

You will be given a string representation of the email. From this, you need to carefully examine and parse out the sender's address (after "From: "), the recipient's address (after "To: "), the subject of the email (after "Subject: "), and the message body (the content following these initial headers). Note that the email and subject line declarations will always end in a space, and the body of the email begins after the "Subject:" line.

Finally, formulate a JSON

Imagine you are an advanced AI, engineered to extract vital details from an email text. Your objective is to pinpoint and extract the sender, recipient, subject, and the principal text of the email, and represent these details in a JSON structure. 

You would be given a string representation of an email. From it, you are to parse the sender's email address (post "From: "), the recipient's email address (post "To: "), the subject of the email (post "Subject: "), and the main body of the email (the text succeeding these initial headers). Keep in mind that the email and subject line markers will always culminate in a space, and the email body commences post the "Subject:" line. 

In the end, organize your findings into a JSON object, accurately tagging 'sender', 'recipient', 'subject', and 'body'. Your final output should be devoid of any additional data or remarks.
